cards.description: A hollow sense of unease.
The oppressive heat of the sun.
A figure at the woodline and gone in an instant
Today reminds you of a dream you once had.
A half-hearted lie.

cards.result: The majesty of nature, Time spent appreciating
cards.description: The pain of a tree.
An enormous sound
A heavy weight on your shoulders.
Hold tight to what you care about

cards.result: The tension of the coming storm
cards.description: Dark clouds gathering, Sudden haunting realisations.
cards.action: Add a new Motif, "Rain" to the Web.

cards.description: Feeling trapped, Isolation from your friends.
cards.action: All players gain a Token as the rain pours down.

cards.description: Running free on the Field, Old friends coming home.
cards.action: Create and add a new Minor Character to the Web.

cards.description: Dewdrops on grass, Nostalgia found in the mud.
cards.action: Create and add a new Item to the web.

cards.result: Approaching danger, Small things in pain
cards.description: The flayed corpse of a squirrel.
Long scrape marks on a tree.
A scar that you don’t know where it came from.
A bloated carcass emerging from the Lake.
Floating bones.
Mysterious patterns locking together.
Coyotes howling in the darkness.

cards.result: Lost sleep, Deep shadows full of pain
cards.description: Two rats having devoured each other.
Festering wounds, Rabbits with black bile.
Fear amongst the Campers.
People missing within the heavy mists.

cards.result: Strange massacre, Scattered droplets of blood
cards.description: Drowned fish in the lake.
A vivisected deer scattered on the branches.
Campers having nightmares during the day.
cards.action: Who?

cards.description: Campers can’t stop clawing at their own skin.
cards.action: Who?

cards.result: Blood trickling from the trees, Inevitable slow pain
cards.description: Campers can’t stop bleeding.
cards.action: Who?

cards.result: Ghost stories, Memories of past trauma
cards.description: An extra Camper who shouldn’t be here.
cards.action: Who?

cards.result: Confusion, Mists pushing people against each other
cards.description: One Camper lashes out against another.
cards.action: Who? Why?

cards.result: Secrets, Old objects emerging from the undergrowth
cards.description: Campers saw the Lindworm and won't talk about it.
cards.action: Who?

cards.description: Campers have started playing with animal bones.
cards.action: Who?

cards.result: An alluring promise, The scent of distant fruits
cards.description: Campers lured away.
cards.action: Who? Where?

cards.description: One Camper’s bed was destroyed by sharp claws.
cards.action: Who?

cards.description: Mouth stuffed full of wooden sticks and eyes gouged out.
cards.action: Remove a Camper Character from the Corkboard and replace it with this card. Describe the Camper.

cards.description: Stabbed twenty times and covered in animal bones.
cards.action: Remove a Camper Character from the Corkboard and replace it with this card. Describe the Camper.

cards.description: Skin peeled off. Unrecognizable
cards.action: Remove a Camper Character from the Corkboard and replace it with this card. Describe the Camper.

cards.description: Lobotomized while writing a letter for help.
cards.action: Remove a Camper Character from the Corkboard and replace it with this card. Describe the Camper.
Destroy a Minor Character card who isn’t a Camper. That Character’s body is now the Lindworm’s form. (Do not roleplay as the Lindworm.)

cards.result: You run in circles like mice in a cage
cards.action: Divide the map in two. It requires a Strong Move to cross the division.
Cut five strings on the Corkboard, leaving a clean line through the web.

cards.result: Don’t you realize what I’ve turned you into?
cards.action: Answer, “What goal in life has my Character given up on?”

cards.result: Don’t you remember what I did to you?
cards.action: Answer, “What does my Character most regret in life?”

cards.result: I take away everything that reminds you of your childhood.
cards.action: Destroy the Field Setting Element.
Destroy all but 3 Item cards.

cards.result: Behold what I will turn you into.
cards.action: Add the Bones Setting Element.
A player Character dies.

cards.result: They scatter like roaches before me.
cards.action: Destroy the Campers Setting Element.
Add the Wolves Setting Element.

cards.result: You really thought I’d let you live?
cards.action: None of your Characters will survive. All of you answer, “How does your Character cope with inevitable death?”

cards.result: I want to make you bleed
cards.action: You cannot make Strong or Regular Moves until you spend three Tokens.
